ComicInfo.Summary: Zatanna attempts to turn Constantine into a vampire. Batman and Green Arrow confront each other, each believing the other to be a vampire. When they realize the truth, Batman lets Ollie know that Hal has been turned. Meanwhile, Batgirl and Nightwing investigate a lead that may explain more of the vampires' plans, while Jason and Cassandra battle a vampiric Gorilla Grodd.
